main event: A bright object was observed streaking across the sky in SW Libya in January 1958.
interesting points: The object exhibited an extremely brilliant glow and stopped suddenly at a high altitude,Significant rapid acceleration was noted during the sighting,Approximately 20-30 seconds after the object disappeared, a radar blip was picked up increasing in speed and altitude,There is speculation that the sighting could be linked to a satellite observation but was thought more likely to be a meteor,The report mentions unreliable local sources and the inability to obtain further information.
sighted object: a bright streaking object in the sky
